about_the_game:
A couple of misfits living in harmony with nature that surrounds them in a trailer located along a country road leading to a popular country club for wealthy bourgeois. She, a dedicated wicca witchcraft, spends his days studying manuals of black magic, while he, his man, a hunter silent and unsociable, gives her the game to be sacrificed. Seeking wealth through spells and curses, the harmony of the couple will be cracked by a series of wrongs, until the situation degenerates.

Directed by: Alessandro Redaelli
Produced by: Daniele Fagone, Alessandro Redaelli, Ruggero Melis
Starring: Massimo Onorato, Francesca Ghezzi, Francesca Germini, Davide Cazzani, Federico Toniolo

reviews:
“Pray for Diamonds is a short well-directed , laudable , charming and engaging that offers unforgettable shots but also manages to convey a certain squalor”
Darkveins

“The story is original, ranging from surreal to other esoteric, with some notable outbreaks of violence almost in sauce "rape & revenge" : it is a concrete and brutal story, but at the same time " metaphysical " and rarefied, not easily understandable and open to the imagination of the viewer.”
Nonsologore
short_description: Pray for Diamonds is an experimental short film directed by Alessandro Redaelli.
